story_title: Mystery of the Missing Sodder Children on Christmas Eve
original_story: [mysterious] What if I told you five children vanished into thin air? On Christmas Eve 1945, a fire engulfed the Sodder home in West Virginia. While the parents and four siblings escaped, the other five disappeared without a trace. Strange clues emergedâ€”a ladder leading to the roof and a suspicious car parked nearby. As the family searched for answers, sightings of the children were reported for years. To this day, their fate remains a chilling mystery. [pause:1s] Where did they go?
